Flux.limiter_prompt_format: Use natural language, do not repeat the same words and duplicate adjectives, create a prompt for generative AI visual model Flux

SDXL.limiter_prompt_format: Use tags for descriptions and subjects, a shorter descriptions of a scene, adjectives, descriptors, for generative art stable diffusion and SDXL

SD3.5.limiter_prompt_format: Use natural language, be concise, very descriptive and do not repeat yourself, capture the scene concisely and meticulously for generative AI stable diffusion model SD3.5
